entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the main character in this conversation. He is referred to as 'Big D' and 'Ickle Diddykins'. His mother calls him these names.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Dudley's cousin. He teases Dudley about his nicknames.

relationships.description: Dudley and Harry are cousins, as mentioned in the conversation.
Dudley has beaten up Mark Evans two nights ago.
